=== About ===

Conall is a 23 year old Systems Administrator in Dublin, Ireland.

When he gets the chance, he contributes to the Ubuntu and Debian projects, by reporting and triaging bugs, maintaining packages (specifically server and monitoring related software) and by occasionally answering questions on mailing lists and writing/editing wiki documentation.

Contact and public key details are available from his <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/people/conall|Launchpad Profile]]</nowiki>
